text: 13.13 Luk 21.34, Epe 5.18, Plp 4.8, 1 Te 4.12, Jem 3.14, 1 Pi 2.12, 4.3 Mɨlek tep adek ak mɨdɨl, man tɨkek wɨdɨn nɨŋɨd ajɨpal tek ajonɨgun. Chɨn pen tap nɨgep ma nɨgep gɨl, ñɨg kɨles ñɨbɨl sawl lɨl, bin si bɨ si gɨl, chɨbol chɨnop tɨkjakɨl tap tɨmel gach ak gɨl, mɨlɨk yapek penpen agɨlɨg mɨdɨl, binɨb kɨlop nɨgon chɨbol chɨnop ak tɨmel gɨl, adek anɨb okok ma gɨnɨgun. Mel yɨbɨl.
